description.narrative: To increase the resilience of people and economic assets to natural hazards in selected river basins of the project provinces within the overall framework of Vietnam's National Disaster Prevention, Response and Mitigation Strategy Towards 2020.

Ministry of Natural Resources and Environment, Vietnam

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :FA - Schedule 2 - A1 | Description :Establishment of project Steering Committee | Due Date :31-Dec-2012
Finance Agreement :FA-Schedule 2 Section II-A1 | Description :Monitor and evaluate the progress and prepare project progressreports | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :FA-Schedule 2 Section II-B3 | Description :Submit annual audited financial statements | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :FA-Schedule 2-C2 | Description :Establishment of an independent Panel of Experts on safety of dams (POE) | DueDate :31-Mar-2013
Finance Agreement :FA-Schedule 2-C7(a) | Description :Prepare dam safety report for Thach Ban dam safety subproject | Due Date:31-Dec-2012

title.narrative: Integrated national EW System and Operations Plan for Hydromet Sector adopted by 2014
Number of provincial river basin plans prepared or updated with DRM factors and approved by the PPC
Number of commune-level Socio-Economic Development Plans (SEDP) revised to integrate DRM and approved
Number of communes with emergency preparedness plans in place
Number of additional hydromet stations installed and connected to the national system
DRM-related databases (dam, building codes) established and maintained
Km. of evacuation/rescue roads established/rehabilitated following prescribed standards
Number of people protected by enhanced priority infrastructure built by the project
Hectares of land protected by enhanced flood protection measures
No. of Gov. staff trained at the national and provincial levels
Km. of dyke and river embankments improved
Number of disaster prone communes that participate in evacuation drills
Number of communes covered by storm and flood early warning services and with increased awareness about emergency response
